hed: James Costos and Interior Decorator Michael S. Smith at Home in Spain
dek: Ambassador James Costos and his longtime partner, interior designer Michael S. Smith, refresh the U.S. embassy residence in Madrid with debonair élan

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-01-slideshow.jpg
items.caption: A cluster of Philip Taaffe artworks and an Esteban Vicente painting animate a corner of the piano room at the U.S. Ambassador to Spain’s Madrid residence, which was renovated by decorator [Michael S. Smith](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/), partner of the current ambassador, James Costos. A sofa designed by Smith joins club chairs clad in a gold [Brunschwig & Fils](http://brunschwig.com/) velvet, a Giacometti-style cocktail table from [JF Chen](http://jfchen.com/), and [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home) gilt armchairs upholstered in a Jasper leather. The windows are dressed with curtains of a [Templeton](http://templetonfabrics.com/) stripe and bamboo shades by Smith, while the table lamps are by [Vaughan](http://vaughandesigns.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-02.jpg
items.caption: The front drive of the ambassador’s residence, which is connected to the embassy office building behind it.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-03.jpg
items.caption: In the family room, framed 19th-century scenic wallpaper hangs behind Ambassador Costos (standing) and Smith; the fabric on the antique armchairs is by [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home), as is the stone-top low table, and the rug is by [Stanton Carpet](http://www.stantoncarpet.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-04.jpg
items.caption: Antique faux-porphyry urns are mounted on either side of the family room’s framed scenic wallpaper.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-05.jpg
items.caption: Most of the art in the residence was obtained through the [Art in Embassies](http://art.state.gov/) program, including the David Wiseman light sculpture and Josef Albers paintings that overlook the stair hall.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-06.jpg
items.caption: In the entrance hall, a work by Robert Rauschenberg is mounted above the antique console that displays the residence’s guest book.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-07.jpg
items.caption: A close-up of the guest book.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-08.jpg
items.caption: The living room’s sofas are joined by Louis XVI armchairs covered in a [Lee Jofa](http://leejofa.com/default.htm) flame stitch. A Pat Steir painting hangs at far left, a mixed-media work by Antoni Tàpies is displayed at center, and a 12-panel Qing-dynasty Coromandel screen graces the wall at right. The curtains are of a Lee Jofa stripe edged with a [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home) silk, the table lamp between the sofas is by [Vaughan](http://vaughandesigns.com/), and the Hindu Kush–style carpet is by [J. D. Staron](http://www.jdstaron.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-09.jpg
items.caption: A warm [Valspar](http://www.valsparpaint.com/en/index.html) paint covers the dining room walls, which are complemented by curtains of an olive [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home) fabric; the Smith-designed chairs are cushioned in a Jasper leather, and the Persian rug is 19th century.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-10.jpg
items.caption: A Julie Mehretu painting dominates one wall of the dining room; the neon photo work is by Glenn Ligon.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-11.jpg
items.caption: The dining table is set with antique plates, blue State Department chargers, antique silver, and glassware by [Astier de Villatte](http://www.astierdevillatte.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-12.jpg
items.caption: Presiding over the library is an artwork by Walton Ford; the antique armchair is clad in a [Sabina Fay Braxton](http://www.sabinafaybraxton.com/) velvet, the cocktail table is from [Charles Jacobsen](http://charlesjacobsen.com/), and the antique rug is from India.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-13.jpg
items.caption: A [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home) paisley hemp is used for the curtains and wall covering in the Barcelona guest room; mirrors from Smith’s collection for [Mirror Image Home](https://mirrorimagehome.com/) flank the bed, which is upholstered in a Jasper linen and dressed in [Matouk](https://www.matouk.com/) bedding.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-14.jpg
items.caption: The Sevilla bedroom is enlivened by panels of 18th-century Spanish silk velvet; the mirrors are 17th century, the bedding is by [Matouk](https://www.matouk.com/), and the antique love seat is upholstered in a [Templeton](http://templetonfabrics.com/) fabric.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-15.jpg
items.caption: Framed antique wallpaper panels decorate the Madrid sitting room, where a sofa covered in a [Cowtan & Tout](http://www.cowtan.com/) fabric faces a cocktail table by [Bardeaux Meuble](http://bardeauxmobilier.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-artful-diplomacy-james-costos-michael-smith-designed-madrid-home-16.jpg
items.caption: In the master bedroom, which is lined with a hand-painted [Gracie](http://www.graciestudio.com/) wallpaper, the [Jasper](http://www.michaelsmithinc.com/jasper-home) gilded bed is accompanied by a mahogany console and a commode, both Louis XVI; the Louis XVI–style fauteuils near the window are antique, and the rug is by [Stanton Carpet](http://www.stantoncarpet.com/).
